Section.name: Highlighted Additions/Changes
Section.p: This release contains the following significant updates and extensions to the SIF specification.

ul.li: StudentDataTransferNote object added for this release. This object serves to communicate student movements between schools via a national Student Data Transfer Exchange.
ScheduledActivity/ActivityEndDate, requested by QLD DoE: used to represent multi-day excursions.
StudentPersonal/CategoryOfDisability, for tracking of disability as an equity cohort among students, without depending on NCCD classification specific to a student enrollment.
SIF_MetadataType/ETag, added as long-standing request by QLD DoE to prevent collision between data object updates under race conditions.

SIF_MetadataType/EducationFilter, TimeElementType/Type, TimeElementType/Code, TimeElementType/Name, TimeElementType/Value, SpanGapType/Type, SpanGapType/Code, SpanGapType/Name, SpanGapType/Value, removed as part of SIF Metadata rationalisation.
Added FTE Type as string encoding of FTEs with two digit precision, to ensure JSON round-tripping without loss of precision.

Added NAPLANScoreWithYearsType, NAPLANScoreWithYearsListType to support publishing NAPLAN results along with the test level and the year the test was administered, for use in Student Data Transfer Protocol.

Added ArrivalSchoolType, DepartureSchoolType, PreviousSchoolListType, PreviousSchoolType, EducationalAssessmentListType, EducationalAssessmentType, STDNGradeListType, STDNGradeType, for use in Student Data Transfer Protocol.
Added NCCDType, NCCDListType to support capturing NCCD assessment along with the date of the assessment, for use in Student Data Transfer Protocol.
Added NCCD Disability, to systematise representation of disability in the specification and for use in Student Data Transfer Protocol. (Information sourced from NCCD.)
Addition to Attendance Code—627, Modified Timetable (Reduced Hours), requested by DET VIC as new absence category.
Refactor StudentSchoolEnrollment/DisabilityCategory to use the new NCCD Disability codeset.
Refactor StudentSchoolEnrollment/DisabilityLevelOfAdjustment to use the new NCCD Adjustment codeset.

Update StaffAssignment/JobFTE, StudentSchoolEnrollment/FTE, StudentParticipation/StudentSpecialEducationFTE, StudentAttendanceSummary/FTE, StaffAssignmentMostRecentContainerType/PrimaryFTE, StaffAssignmentMostRecentContainerType/SecondaryFTE, CensusSudentType/FTE, StudentMostRecentContainerType/FTE to use the new FTE Type type, as a string rather than a decimal, in order to ensure JSON round-tripping without loss of precision.

Update TermInfo/RelativeDuration, StatsCohortType/AttendanceDays, CensusStaffType/PrimaryFTE, CensusStaffType/SecondaryFTE, CensusStaffType/JobFTE, AttendanceInfoType/AttendanceValue to be strings with regular expression facets rather than decimals with precision facets, in order to ensure JSON round-tripping without loss of precision.
